title: Spacious 2x1 Apt. Home, Quiet, Gated Community, Close to Shopping!
map_address: Buena Vista Ave. near Gresham Dr.
posting_body: ['Spacious 2X1 Bedroom Apartment', 'Looking for a quiet, cozy home in Alameda?', 'Consider Alameda Park Apartments!', 'Second floor unit!', 'Apartment Features', '******************', 'Wood flooring in living room, hallway and bedroom', 'Carpet in both bedrooms', 'Granite countertops in kitchen and bath', 'Kitchen with refrigerator, range, disposal and subway tile backsplash', 'Spacious living room and bedroom', 'Large room-width bedroom closet', 'Tile floor in kitchen and bathroom', 'Vertical blinds throughout', 'Updated lighting fixtures and ceiling fan', 'Dual pane windows', 'High-speed internet ready', 'Cat-friendly unit (with pet rent and deposit - maximum of 2 pets)', 'Private storage unit (available for $20.00 monthly)', 'Utilities', 'Water, sewer and trash included', 'Gas and electricity paid by resident', '12 month lease', '$1290 security deposit with good credit', 'Alameda Park Apartments is a family-owned, two-building community of one and two bedroom courtyard style apartments in West Alameda.', 'Enjoy the best of both worlds here in a home on the suburban Alameda Island!', 'We offer the comfort of a small town, but with easy access to the rich cultural, recreational, and business life of San Francisco, Oakland, and the East Bay Area.', 'Please visit our website for more about the comfort and convenience of living in Alameda.', '*** Phone:', 'show contact info', '***', 'Website: <URL> ***', '*Property Amenities*', 'Gated security', 'Carport parking', 'Landscaped courtyard setting', 'Security lighting throughout', 'Sparkling pool', 'On-site laundry rooms', 'Smoke-free property', 'Professional on-site management & maintenance', 'Schedule a showing!', 'Call Tameka at', 'show contact info', '.', 'Hours: Monday - Friday 8 AM - 5 PM.', 'Website: <URL>', 'do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers']
